game.name: ploink
game.shortDescription: Wacky plinko-inspired roguelike. Design a board of weird items, drop balls with silly little faces then watch the physics explode into a satisfying chain-reaction of numbers until your CPU explodes (Your CPU won't actually explode)
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wacky plinko-inspired roguelike. Design a board of weird items, drop balls with silly little faces then watch the physics explode into a satisfying chain-reaction of numbers until your CPU explodes (Your CPU won't actually explode)
